summary: This document is an email chain between FBI agents discussing the status of the official Medical Examiner's report for Jeffrey Epstein. The agents note the report is still being finalized and they expect to receive it by the end of the week.

persons.name: Mike
persons.context: Initiates the email inquiry asking if the official Medical Examiner's report for Epstein has been received.

persons.name: Driscoll, Michael J.
persons.context: Responds to the inquiry, stating the report has not yet been received and that the Chief Medical Examiner is finalizing it, with an expectation to receive it by the end of the week.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Medical Examiner's report being discussed; his death is the reason for the report.

connections.description: FBI agents communicating about the status of the Epstein Medical Examiner's report.
FBI agent inquiring about the official report concerning Epstein's death.
FBI agent providing an update on the status of the official report concerning Epstein's death.

events.title: Email inquiry about Epstein ME report
events.description: FBI agents exchange emails regarding the status of the official Medical Examiner's report for Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: As of August 27, 2019, the official Medical Examiner's report for Jeffrey Epstein had not yet been received by the FBI.
The Chief Medical Examiner was still finalizing the report at that time.
The FBI was told they should receive the report by the end of that week.
The communication shows the FBI's active interest in obtaining the official report on Epstein's death.
